job description:
We are looking for a Data Analyst/Business Analyst to support a project related to our clients ability to meet federal regulatory reporting requirements regarding reimbursements in Medicare/Medicaid. The Business Analyst / Data Analyst will be responsible for understanding regulatory reporting requirements and developing a process for accessing and reporting on the data. The data resides in excel and therefore we will need very strong excel skills to gather and report on the data.

The ideal Business Analyst candidate has the following experience:
  • Healthcare or Health Insurance industry experience
  • Experience with Claims Data (preferably Medicare or Medicaid)
  • Experience gathering reporting requirements
  • Strong Excel skills
To apply for this position, we'd love to hear from you to dave @primeteampartners.com . For all opportunities, currently being offered by Prime Team Partners, please visit www.primeteampartners.com.

Prime Team Partners is an equal opportunity employer.
